Comment: The deductibility of SALT at the federal level has no impact on the amount of state taxes that you pay. It only changes the amount you pay federally   As long as the benefits from state taxation are federally-exempt from income, then the taxes used to fund those benefits shouldn’t be deductible. That’s how we treat every other transfer in the tax code, other than SALT
